metadata.title: CVE-2018-14379 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: MP4Atom::factory in mp4atom.cpp in MP4v2 2.0.0 incorrectly uses theMP4ItemAtom data type in a certain case where MP4DataAtom is required,which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memorycorruption) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted MP4file, because access to the data structure has different expectations aboutlayout as a result of this type confusion.

criterions.comment: mp4v2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
